H0.text: What type of coal is brown and fibrous. Peat

H1.text: What type of coal is brown and fibrous. Sub-bituminous coal

H2.text: What type of coal is brown and fibrous. Torbanite

H3.text: What type of coal is brown and fibrous. Lignite

A4.text: Torbanite is a variety of fine-grained black oil shale.

A5.text: Peat is often the first step in the formation of fossil fuels such as coal, particularly low-grade coal such as lignite.

A6.text: Peat is an accumulation of partially decayed vegetation or organic matter.
